title: Track Asset Maintenance History
description: A public works manager wants to see the maintenance history for a specific city vehicle.

tasks.description: Identify the vehicle in the asset management system using its asset ID number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager successfully locates the vehicle's record.

tasks.description: Retrieve all maintenance work orders associated with the vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager gets a complete list of all past repairs and preventive maintenance.

tasks.description: Review the history to identify any recurring issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager reviews the data and notes the vehicle has had recurring transmission problems.
